attributes.action: Amend Housing Laws so that debts accrued by the 'Bedroom Tax' are deemed as 'ordinary debt'.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, call on the Westminster Government to amend Housing Laws so that debts accrued by the 'Bedroom Tax' are deemed as 'ordinary debt' thus removing the threat of eviction from tenants who are in arrears due to the 'bedroom tax'.
